Quote.Author: Nigel Farage
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a European Union of economic failure, of mass unemployment and of low growth

Quote.Author: Nigel Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: We already have a sabbatical system. It's called opposition, and I've had enough of it

Quote.Author: Nigella Lawson
Quote.QuoteValue: Emotion is messy, contradictory... and true

Quote.Author: Nik Wallenda
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the things I enjoy is the challenge of Mother Nature

Quote.Author: Nikita Khrushchev
Quote.QuoteValue: If you live among wolves you have to act like a wolf

Quote.Author: Nikki Cox
Quote.QuoteValue: I still don't know quite what I'm supposed to do or be

Quote.Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote.QuoteValue: For most of my life, I've thought of myself as pretty cool

Quote.Author: Nikki Haley
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone can have a bad day

Quote.Author: Nikki Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned how to change a cloth diaper on a raccoon. I was maybe 8 or 9

Quote.Author: Nikki Sixx
Quote.QuoteValue: I forgive my mom for being a psycho and my dad for being a loser

Quote.Author: Niklas Zennstrom
Quote.QuoteValue: We also have a conference call feature where up to five people can talk on one Skype call

Quote.Author: Nikolaj Coste
Quote.QuoteValue: aldau - I think advice is cheap. You can only really learn by doing and making mistakes

Quote.Author: Nikos Kazantzakis
Quote.QuoteValue: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can

Quote.Author: Nile Rodgers
Quote.QuoteValue: Bands always call me when they are in need of a boost and I come in and put them back on top

Quote.Author: Nina Arianda
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite place to vacation is anyplace by the ocean

Quote.Author: Nina Dobrev
Quote.QuoteValue: Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun

Quote.Author: Nina Easton
Quote.QuoteValue: Public anger over bank bailouts was as much about fairness as the billions of dollars spent

Quote.Author: Nina Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Serving jury duty is a fascinating little slice of life, with its motley crew of personalities

Quote.Author: Nina Hagen
Quote.QuoteValue: As long as karma exists, the world changes. There will always be karma to be taken care of

Quote.Author: Nita Ambani
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood is the most challenging as well as the utmost satisfying vocation in this world

Quote.Author: Noah Baumbach
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a kid, I would fantasize about my own funeral

Quote.Author: Nobu Matsuhisa
Quote.QuoteValue: Making sushi is an art, and experience is everything

Quote.Author: Noel Coward
Quote.QuoteValue: If you must have motivation, think of your paycheck on Friday

Quote.Author: Noel Gallagher
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not interested in making money. It's just that with my talent, I'm cursed with it

Quote.Author: Nolan Bushnell
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want the future to happen faster. I can't imagine the future without robots

Quote.Author: Nora Ephron
Quote.QuoteValue: If pregnancy were a book they would cut the last two chapters

Quote.Author: Nora Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: In the summer of '80, Silhouette bought my first book

Quote.Author: Norah Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Without a piano I don't know how to stand, don't know what to do with my hands

Quote.Author: Norm MacDonald
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not gay, so I don't know much about Broadway musicals

Quote.Author: Norma McCorvey
Quote.QuoteValue: The holocaust against the unborn is the greatest sin they could ever do or even ever participate in

Quote.Author: Norman Borlaug
Quote.QuoteValue: Man seems to insist on ignoring the lessons available from history

Quote.Author: Norman Cousins
Quote.QuoteValue: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live

Quote.Author: Norman Davies
Quote.QuoteValue: The Black Sea is Eastern Europe's counterpart to the Mediterranean

Quote.Author: Norman Granz
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm talking as a professional impresario. I'm not judging anybody at all

Quote.Author: Norman Jewison
Quote.QuoteValue: Betrayal... is my favorite subject

Quote.Author: Norman Lloyd
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a conflict between what's in your mind and what's in your body

Quote.Author: Norman Mailer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hip is the sophistication of the wise primitive in a giant jungle

Quote.Author: Norman Reedus
Quote.QuoteValue: The dogs with the loudest bark are the ones that are most afraid

Quote.Author: Norman Rockwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Some folks think I painted Lincoln from life, but I haven't been around that long. Not quite

Quote.Author: Norman Wisdom
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in very sorry circumstances. Both of my parents were very sorry

Quote.Author: Normani Kordei
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't allow someone's hate to dictate your life

Quote.Author: Novak Djokovic
Quote.QuoteValue: Joking around is part of my personality, just who I am

Quote.Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote.QuoteValue: I am affected by what is around. I don't think many people would admit that

Quote.Author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan
Quote.QuoteValue: When people start dancing, they dance like they don't know they are doing it

Quote.Author: Nyle DiMarco
Quote.QuoteValue: American Sign Language requires a lot of facial and body expression

Quote.Author: O. Henry
Quote.QuoteValue: The true adventurer goes forth aimless and uncalculating to meet and greet unknown fate

Quote.Author: O. J. Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm absolutely, l00 percent, not guilty

Quote.Author: Obie Trice
Quote.QuoteValue: I just do what I'm here for and that's to make that music

Quote.Author: Octavia E. Butler
Quote.QuoteValue: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself

Quote.Author: Octavia Spencer
Quote.QuoteValue: The way to bring about change is to be proactive and active

Quote.Author: Octavio Paz
Quote.QuoteValue: Deserve your dream

Quote.Author: Odell Beckham, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: I've personally never had the chance to go to Lambeau Field

Quote.Author: Og Mandino
Quote.QuoteValue: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later

Quote.Author: Ogden Nash
Quote.QuoteValue: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore

Quote.Author: Oksana Baiul
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish I could compete again, but my good feeling is, these competitions are better as exhibitions

Quote.Author: Oleg Cassini
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion anticipates

Quote.Author: Olga Kurylenko
Quote.QuoteValue: I love boats. I can be on a boat for days

Quote.Author: Oliver Cromwell
Quote.QuoteValue: He who stops being better stops being good

Quote.Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations

Quote.Author: Oliver Herford
Quote.QuoteValue: Many are called but few get up

Quote.Author: Oliver North
Quote.QuoteValue: I never considered myself a fall guy. I know what I did. I know why I did it. I'm not ashamed of it

Quote.Author: Oliver Reed
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a villain, I've never hurt anyone. I'm just a tawdry character who explodes now and again

Quote.Author: Oliver Sim
Quote.QuoteValue: The darkness of clubs makes me feel much more secure, and you can hide behind smoke and lights

Quote.Author: Oliver Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: There's an electrical thing about movies

Quote.Author: Oliver Tambo
Quote.QuoteValue: The true facts are not always obvious. They often have to be looked for

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote.QuoteValue: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions

Quote.Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.
Quote.QuoteValue: Where we love is home - home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts

Quote.Author: Olivia Colman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like the bullying, do-one-over style of comedy. It's so cheap

Quote.Author: Olivia Culpo
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to have coffee in the morning

Quote.Author: Olivia Munn
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a big fan of Super Troopers, so working with the Broken Lizard guys was so much fun

Quote.Author: Olivia Newto
Quote.QuoteValue: ohn - My memories are inside me - they're not things or a place - I can take them anywhere

Quote.Author: Olivia Wilde
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the really young are fearless, have the optimism, the romanticism to take unimaginable risks

Quote.Author: Olivier Martinez
Quote.QuoteValue: It's nice to have some distance with your family. As long as you're closer to them by love

Quote.Author: Olivier Theyskens
Quote.QuoteValue: Our eyes reflect light. Better that the lips are more like a rose petal

Quote.Author: Olly Murs
Quote.QuoteValue: The first bit of vinyl I bought was Michael Jackson's 'Bad.'

Quote.Author: OMI
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not every day you get to do what you love and have a major story behind it

Quote.Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams

Quote.Author: Orhan Pamuk
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is short, and we should respect every moment of it

Quote.Author: Oriana Fallaci
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot work and be at home with your child. But you want both

Quote.Author: Orison Swett Marden
Quote.QuoteValue: The golden rule for every business man is this: 'Put yourself in your customer's place.'

Quote.Author: Orlando Bloom
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a gentleman is a worthy goal

Quote.Author: Orson Scott Card
Quote.QuoteValue: Metaphors have a way of holding the most truth in the least space

Quote.Author: Orson Welles
Quote.QuoteValue: Create your own visual style... let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others

Quote.Author: Oscar de la Renta
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself

Quote.Author: Oscar Isaac
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Mojave' is a very wild, throwback film with these two dudes going after each other

Quote.Author: Oscar Levant
Quote.QuoteValue: Roses are red, violets are blue, I'm schizophrenic, and so am I

Quote.Author: Oscar Niemeyer
Quote.QuoteValue: Curves are the essence of my work because they are the essence of Brazil, pure and simple

Quote.Author: Oscar Nunez
Quote.QuoteValue: I like game shows

Quote.Author: Oscar Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're a basketball player, you've got to shoot

Quote.Author: Ottmar Hitzfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: My coaching days are now over, and I'm proud of what I've achieved

Quote.Author: Otto von Bismarck
Quote.QuoteValue: Laws are like sausages, it is better not to see them being made

Quote.Author: Ovid
Quote.QuoteValue: The sharp thorn often produces delicate roses

Quote.Author: Ozzy Osbourne
Quote.QuoteValue: It's all part of my journey - I've done a lot of stupid things, but you learn by your mistakes

Quote.Author: P. G. Wodehouse
Quote.QuoteValue: Flowers are happy things

Quote.Author: Pablo Casals
Quote.QuoteValue: To retire is to die

Quote.Author: Paloma Faith
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing better than achieving your goals, whatever they might be

Quote.Author: Pam Grier
Quote.QuoteValue: There are just certain realities about our world and I just happen to be creative within it

Quote.Author: Paracelsus
Quote.QuoteValue: What the eyes perceive in herbs or stones or trees is not yet a remedy; the eyes see only the dross

Quote.Author: Paris Hilton
Quote.QuoteValue: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in

Quote.Author: Park Geu
Quote.QuoteValue: ye - I couldn't stand back and watch the strong economy that my father envisioned go to ruins

Quote.Author: Parker Posey
Quote.QuoteValue: The sound of a golf game is very different than the sound of a football game

Quote.Author: Pat Buchanan
Quote.QuoteValue: The food that enters the mind must be watched as closely as the food that enters the body

Quote.Author: Pat Conroy
Quote.QuoteValue: Without music, life is a journey through a desert

Quote.Author: Pat Metheny
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I have a basic sound aesthetic that is in most of what I do

Quote.Author: Pat Paulsen
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep down, I happen to be very shallow

Quote.Author: Pat Riley
Quote.QuoteValue: A champion needs a motivation above and beyond winning

Quote.Author: Pat Robertson
Quote.QuoteValue: Are we a Christian nation now? It's doubtful. But did we start out as one? Without question

Quote.Author: Patricia Cornwell
Quote.QuoteValue: Survival was my only hope, success my only revenge

Quote.Author: Patrick Kane
Quote.QuoteValue: It has been a motto of mine my whole life - just be yourself

Quote.Author: Patrick Swayze
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I am a Leo. Lion is a giant part of me

Quote.Author: Patsy Cline
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd like to do my first record I ever made, A Church, a Courtroom, and Then Goodbye

Quote.Author: Patti Davis
Quote.QuoteValue: That is your legacy on this Earth when you leave this Earth: how many hearts you touched

Quote.Author: Patti LuPone
Quote.QuoteValue: Smile at a stranger. See what happens

Quote.Author: Patti Stanger
Quote.QuoteValue: To get rid of depression, I swim with dolphins

Quote.Author: Patton Oswalt
Quote.QuoteValue: If you hit a midget on the head with a stick, he turns into 40 gold coins

Quote.Author: Patty Duke
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that all the important people in my life prior to 1982 were victimized by my illness

Quote.Author: Paul Auster
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the sound a typewriter makes

Quote.Author: Paul Bryant
Quote.QuoteValue: Show class, have pride, and display character. If you do, winning takes care of itself

Quote.Author: Paul Cezanne
Quote.QuoteValue: The most seductive thing about art is the personality of the artist himself

Quote.Author: Paul Craig Roberts
Quote.QuoteValue: For a country to be looted, its people's voice must be silenced

Quote.Author: Paul Dano
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you sometimes have to go hit rock bottom before you can grow and rebuild as a person

Quote.Author: Paul Farmer
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about rights is that in the end you can't prove what should be considered a right

Quote.Author: Paul Feig
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad women's comedies are made by men who didn't consult enough women

Quote.Author: Paul Gosar
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need to be lectured by the Pope about climate change

Quote.Author: Paul Haggis
Quote.QuoteValue: We give you characters we'd feel very comfortable judging, and then go: 'Oh yeah? Watch this'

Quote.Author: Paul Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Personality has power to uplift, power to depress, power to curse, and power to bless

Quote.Author: Paul Harvey
Quote.QuoteValue: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore,' shoot six, and write down five

Quote.Author: Paul Hawken
Quote.QuoteValue: The first rule of sustainability is to align with natural forces, or at least not try to defy them

Quote.Author: Paul Hollywood
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a favourite cake, pastry, pudding or pie from when they were kids

Quote.Author: Paul Keating
Quote.QuoteValue: The great curse of modern political life is incrementalism

Quote.Author: Paul Lynde
Quote.QuoteValue: Sandwiches are wonderful. You don't need a spoon or a plate!

Quote.Author: Paul McCartney
Quote.QuoteValue: Think globally, act locally

Quote.Author: Paul Mooney
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't change the past, but one person can change the future - anything can happen

Quote.Author: Paul Newman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always a character actor. I just looked like Little Red Riding Hood

Quote.Author: Paul Prudhomme
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food

Quote.Author: Paul Ricoeur
Quote.QuoteValue: The logic of validation allows us to move between the two limits of dogmatism and skepticism

Quote.Author: Paul Ryan
Quote.QuoteValue: Hey, I'm a Catholic deer hunter, I am happy to be clinging to my guns and my religion

Quote.Author: Paul Samuelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Good questions outrank easy answers

Quote.Author: Paul Simon
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about the sound of a train that's very romantic and nostalgic and hopeful

Quote.Author: Paul Stanley
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're in a position to have gotten so much, the gift at this point is giving back

Quote.Author: Paul Theroux
Quote.QuoteValue: Winter is a season of recovery and preparation

Quote.Author: Paul Thomas Anderson
Quote.QuoteValue: Screenwriting is like ironing. You move forward a little bit and go back and smooth things out

Quote.Author: Paul Tillich
Quote.QuoteValue: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone

Quote.Author: Paul Valery
Quote.QuoteValue: A poem is never finished, only abandoned

Quote.Author: Paul Walker
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes the hurdles aren't really hurdles at all. They're welcome challenges, tests

Quote.Author: Paul Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: The most powerful weapon in the world, as far as I'm concerned, is the camera

Quote.Author: Paul Weller
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't live a lie. You have to follow your heart

Quote.Author: Paul Wellstone
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers

Quote.Author: Paula Abdul
Quote.QuoteValue: 'American Idol' has taken over my whole life

Quote.Author: Pauly Shore
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever someone dies everyone says, I love that guy, except for Jeffrey Dahmer

Quote.Author: Payal Kadakia
Quote.QuoteValue: Be true to yourself and surround yourself with positive, supportive people

Quote.Author: Peace Pilgrim
Quote.QuoteValue: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought

Quote.Author: Pearl Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: A crown, if it hurts us, is not worth wearing

Quote.Author: Pearl S. Buck
Quote.QuoteValue: Love alone could waken love

Quote.Author: Penelope Cruz
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot live your life looking at yourself from someone else's point of view

Quote.Author: Penn Jillette
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never had a drink of alcohol or any drug in my life

Quote.Author: Penny Marshall
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not having a good time, find something else that gives you some joy in life

Quote.Author: Pep Guardiola
Quote.QuoteValue: In football, the worst things are excuses. Excuses mean you cannot grow or move forward

Quote.Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley
Quote.QuoteValue: History is a cyclic poem written by time upon the memories of man

Quote.Author: Pete Gallego
Quote.QuoteValue: I saw how hard my parents worked, and I didn't want to be a freeloader

Quote.Author: Pete Hamill
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's a beautiful day, I love taking walks. The walks are always aimless

Quote.Author: Pete Rose
Quote.QuoteValue: If somebody is gracious enough to give me a second chance, I won't need a third

Quote.Author: Pete Sampras
Quote.QuoteValue: All I cared about in tennis was winning

Quote.Author: Pete Seeger
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to turn the clock back to when people lived in small villages and took care of each other

Quote.Author: Pete Townshend
Quote.QuoteValue: We tried not to age, but time had its rage

Quote.Author: Peter Bart
Quote.QuoteValue: A green-light meeting is when the decision is made finally whether or not to make a given picture

Quote.Author: Peter Capaldi
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the periods of being unsuccessful have made me a better actor

Quote.Author: Peter Diamandis
Quote.QuoteValue: Have an open mind - allow different ideas into your way of thinking

Quote.Author: Peter Dinklage
Quote.QuoteValue: Anything that opens up people's perceptions a bit is good

Quote.Author: Peter Falk
Quote.QuoteValue: I lose things. I am preoccupied. I am misty. Eyeglasses? I go through eyeglasses like tissue

Quote.Author: Peter Hook
Quote.QuoteValue: Sarcasm is a Manchester trait

Quote.Author: Peter Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: The most honest form of filmmaking is to make a film for yourself

Quote.Author: Peter Jennings
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people continue to pretend that anchor people are reporters

Quote.Author: Peter McWilliams
Quote.QuoteValue: Definition of a victim: a person to whom life happens

Quote.Author: Peter O'Toole
Quote.QuoteValue: I was apprehensive about bringing off this Homer

Quote.Author: Peter Shaffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Art and literature are my surrogate religions

Quote.Author: Peter Singer
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think there's anything in the compromise that means that there's a clash of ethics

Quote.Author: Peter Steele
Quote.QuoteValue: I think anyone who has an opinion, and voices it, will offend someone

Quote.Author: Peter Thiel
Quote.QuoteValue: Technology just means information technology

Quote.Author: Peter Ustinov
Quote.QuoteValue: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious

Quote.Author: Peyton Manning
Quote.QuoteValue: Pressure is something you feel when you don't know what the hell you're doing

Quote.Author: Phaedrus
Quote.QuoteValue: An alliance with a powerful person is never safe

Quote.Author: Pharrell Williams
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to luggage, I am an underpacker

Quote.Author: Phil Collins
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a singer who plays a bit of drums. I'm a drummer that sings a bit

Quote.Author: Phil Gingrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Deep ocean drilling is not new

Quote.Author: Phil Jackson
Quote.QuoteValue: Always keep an open mind and a compassionate heart

Quote.Author: Phil Klay
Quote.QuoteValue: Resilience is, of course, necessary for a warrior. But a lack of empathy isn't

Quote.Author: Philip James Bailey
Quote.QuoteValue: Simplicity is natures first step, and the last of art

Quote.Author: Philip Johnson
Quote.QuoteValue: Architecture is basically the design of interiors, the art of organizing interior space

Quote.Author: Philip K. Dick
Quote.QuoteValue: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane

Quote.Author: Philip Seymour Hoffman
Quote.QuoteValue: I know I wasn't as handsome as some other guys, but I was OK with that

Quote.Author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield
Quote.QuoteValue: Our own self-love draws a thick veil between us and our faults

Quote.Author: Philippe Petit
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the poet of the high wire - I never do stunts; I do theatrical performances

Quote.Author: Phillips Brooks
Quote.QuoteValue: Be patient and understanding. Life is too short to be vengeful or malicious

Quote.Author: Phyllis Diller
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is a curve that sets everything straight

Quote.Author: Phyllis Schlafly
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to determining child custody, however, sexism is the rule

Quote.Author: Pico Iyer
Quote.QuoteValue: For centuries, Cuba's greatest resource has been its people

Quote.Author: Pierce Brosnan
Quote.QuoteValue: My religious philosophy is kindness. Try to be kind. That's something worth achieving

Quote.Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote.QuoteValue: The important thing in life is not to triumph but to compete

Quote.Author: Pilou Asbaek
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is not black and white; there is some gray nuance to it

Quote.Author: Pim Fortuyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I say what I think, and I do what I say!

Quote.Author: Pink
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom has always wished me a daughter just like me

Quote.Author: Pitbull
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is my hustle

Quote.Author: Plautus
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us celebrate the occasion with wine and sweet words

Quote.Author: Pliny the Elder
Quote.QuoteValue: Home is where the heart is

Quote.Author: Plutarch
Quote.QuoteValue: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality

Quote.Author: Pope Benedict XVI
Quote.QuoteValue: The church is not a political power; it's not a party, but it's a moral power

Quote.Author: Pope John XXIII
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father

Quote.Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will

Quote.Author: Poppy Delevingne
Quote.QuoteValue: You could say I'm a bit of a nomad

Quote.Author: Portia de Rossi
Quote.QuoteValue: My sexuality is a part of me that I really like. But it's not the totality of me

Quote.Author: Prince Charles
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing like a jolly good disaster to get people to start doing something

Quote.Author: Prince Royce
Quote.QuoteValue: At 17, I was working at Sprint in the Bronx so I could make money to fund my own music

Quote.Author: Priyanka Chopra
Quote.QuoteValue: Any transition is easier if you believe in yourself and your talent

Quote.Author: Psy
Quote.QuoteValue: The world's most famous and popular language is music

Quote.Author: Publilius Syrus
Quote.QuoteValue: Good health and good sense are two of life's greatest blessings

Quote.Author: Pythagoras
Quote.QuoteValue: There is geometry in the humming of the strings, there is music in the spacing of the spheres

Quote.Author: Queen Latifah
Quote.QuoteValue: Be bold, be brave enough to be your true self

Quote.Author: Queen Rania of Jordan
Quote.QuoteValue: If one girl with courage is a revolution, imagine what feats we can achieve together

Quote.Author: Queen Victoria
Quote.QuoteValue: Being pregnant is an occupational hazard of being a wife

Quote.Author: Quentin Blake
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think people get into trouble because they can't say what they want to

Quote.Author: Quentin Crisp
Quote.QuoteValue: Manners are love in a cool climate

Quote.Author: Quentin Tarantino
Quote.QuoteValue: When people ask me if I went to film school I tell them, 'no, I went to films.'

Quote.Author: Quincy Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing the game, and unfortunately, playing the gangster game is very profitable

Quote.Author: Quintilian
Quote.QuoteValue: Whilst we deliberate how to begin a thing, it grows too late to begin it

Quote.Author: Quvenzhane Wallis
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have to be fierce, I'll be fierce

Quote.Author: R. Buckminster Fuller
Quote.QuoteValue: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly

Quote.Author: R. Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're gonna tell your life story, you gotta be honest, or don't do it

Quote.Author: R. Lee Ermey
Quote.QuoteValue: The biggest problem was the politicians knew nothing about fighting a war

Quote.Author: Rachel Kushner
Quote.QuoteValue: I have crashed on a motorcycle that was going at 140mph, so I know what it feels like

Quote.Author: Rachel McAdams
Quote.QuoteValue: Running through airports with pounds of luggage - that's a good workout

Quote.Author: Rachel Platten
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned that I truly am a fighter and that I cannot give up

Quote.Author: Rachel Zoe
Quote.QuoteValue: I think what you wear really does need to reflect what your own personal style is

Quote.Author: Raf Simons
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot have adoration without being criticized

Quote.Author: Rafael dos Anjos
Quote.QuoteValue: I am surrounded by great people

Quote.Author: Rafael Nadal
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the beach. I love the sea. All my life I live within - in front of the sea

Quote.Author: Rahm Emanuel
Quote.QuoteValue: I wake up some mornings hating me too

Quote.Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote.QuoteValue: The only journey is the one within

Quote.Author: Rakul Preet Singh
Quote.QuoteValue: I always feel that I compete with myself

Quote.Author: Ram Charan
Quote.QuoteValue: I am so lazy and sometimes will go as late as 9 A.M. to shoot

Quote.Author: Ram Dass
Quote.QuoteValue: Your problem is you're... too busy holding onto your unworthiness

Quote.Author: Ramakrishna
Quote.QuoteValue: Through love one acquires renunciation and discrimination naturally

Quote.Author: Ramana Maharshi
Quote.QuoteValue: Let come what comes, let go what goes. See what remains

Quote.Author: Ranbir Kapoor
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm actually pretty shy in real life. But I guess in front of the camera, I focus

Quote.Author: Rand Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Does the owner of the restaurant own his restaurant? Or does the government own his restaurant?

Quote.Author: Randy Pausch
Quote.QuoteValue: Never, ever underestimate the importance of having fun

Quote.Author: Raquel Welch
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't fake listening. It shows

Quote.Author: Rashida Jones
Quote.QuoteValue: Chemotherapy is brutal. The goal is pretty much to kill everything in your body without killing you

Quote.Author: Ratan Tata
Quote.QuoteValue: The day I am not able to fly will be a sad day for me

Quote.Author: Ray Comfort
Quote.QuoteValue: When men don't fear God, they give themselves to evil
